sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper RL Network Adapter
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT
tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename , tblAssets.AssetID , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblAssets.Mac)), '') Parent_CorrelationID , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + CAST(tblNetworkAdapter.networkadapterid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblNetworkAdapter.MACAddress)), '') AS CorrelationID , COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblNetworkAdapter.MACAddress)), '') MACAddress , tblNetworkAdapter.Name , tblNetworkAdapter.Manufacturer , tblNetworkAdapter.NetConnectionID , tblNetworkAdapter.NetEnabled , tblNetworkAdapter.Speed , tblNetwork.DefaultIPGateway , tblNetwork.DNSHostname , tblNetwork.IPAddress , tblNetwork.IPSubnet , tblNetwork.DHCPenabled , 'Hardware' Category , 'Network' SubCategory , tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.Lastseen AS LastDiscovered , tblAssetCustom.PurchaseDate AS Purchased , tblAssetCustom.Warrantydate AS Warranty_Expiration , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus
, tblAssets.AssetName AS Parent_Name
, 'NetworkAdapter' AS SourceName , CASE WHEN tblComputersystem.Domainrole IS NULL THEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename WHEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename = 'Windows' AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole > 1 THEN 'WindowsServer' WHEN tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename = 'Windows' AND tblComputersystem.Domainrole IN (0,1) THEN 'WindowsPC' END AS ParentAssetType
, tblAssets.AssetName AS ParentName , tblAssets.Mac AS ParentMACAddress , tblAssetCustom.Serialnumber AS ParentSerialNumber , 'Owns::Owned by' AS RelationType FROM tblAssets INNER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID INNER JOIN tsysAssetTypes ON tsysAssetTypes.AssetType = tblASsets.AssetType INNER JOIN tblNetworkAdapter ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblNetworkAdapter.AssetID AND tblNetworkAdapter.NetEnabled = 1 INNER JOIN tblNetwork ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblNetwork.AssetID AND tblNetworkAdapter.MACAddress = tblNetwork.MACaddress AND IPEnabled = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState ON tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN tblComputersystem ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblComputersystem.AssetID
